adrFormatAddress: 424 E 89th St, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: I had a great experience. The check in process was very quick and simple. I filled everything out online ahead of time which streamlined the process. I was seen soon as I sat down. The staff were all friendly and professional. I was told exactly what to expect and was made to feel comfortable.

text.text: I had a great experience. The check in process was very quick and simple. I filled everything out online ahead of time which streamlined the process. I was seen soon as I sat down. The staff were all friendly and professional. I was told exactly what to expect and was made to feel comfortable.

originalText.text:
The lady making the appointments is incompetent. Her “computer kept erasing” so I had to tell her the same stuff multiple times. The day of the appointment she actually booked me wrong. The funny thing is I had her on speaker phone because she was so awful I wanted someone else to hear.  Not surprised she put in the wrong date but extremely annoyed I had to fast and waste time coming to the east side.

They wanted to rebook the appointment but had me wait on a call from the same woman. I don’t understand why the staff there can’t book the appointment.

originalText.text: The administrative assistant who checked me in was wonderful. She gave me a warm greeting and was extremely courteous. My check-in was very smooth. She was helpful when I didn't understand how to answer a question. The MRI technician was calm, courteous, communicative, and concerned. (He even offered me a warm blanket so I wouldn't be cold during the MRI.) He made this diagnostic test as easy as possible. I would give your facility ten stars if I could.

text.text: The administrative assistant who checked me in was wonderful. She gave me a warm greeting and was extremely courteous. My check-in was very smooth. She was helpful when I didn't understand how to answer a question. The MRI technician was calm, courteous, communicative, and concerned. (He even offered me a warm blanket so I wouldn't be cold during the MRI.) He made this diagnostic test as easy as possible. I would give your facility ten stars if I could.

originalText.text: I made my appointment online - checked in online.  Very easy!!  I was met and taken into MRI exactly on time.  The Technician was kind and he kept me from being anxious.   He spoke to me at the beginning of each segment telling me how long that segment would last and at the end of that segment telling me I was doing great.  His encouragement and kindness made the test easy.  The MRI was closed and I am a little claustrophobic.  He was amazing.  The test completed in no time.  I definitely would have panicked without his caring guidance and kindness. My Orthopedist got the results the same day.    I definitely will only be a patient at EAST RIVER.  Thank You

originalText.text: The process was streamlined and easy for me. I am a physician who has been in practice for almost 30 years. In 2020 I was involved in a serious car accident and found myself playing the role of patient. While this was my first time having outpatient studies at your facility, this was not my first time having outpatient studies done. My MRI at your facility was the best of all of my experiences. Shout out to the receptionist and tech who took care of me. Both of these women are wonderful ambassadors for your organization
